name: Bali
details: Bali is known for its forested volcanic mountains, iconic rice paddies, beaches and coral reefs. A top destination for culture and relaxation.

name: Singapore
details: Singapore offers a vibrant mix of culture, cutting-edge architecture and fantastic food markets.

name: Tokyo
details: Tokyo blends futuristic skyscrapers with historic temples, an unrivaled pop-culture scene and fantastic cuisine.

name: New York
details: New York is famous for its skyline, museums, theatre scene and diverse neighbourhoods.
